comment.body: Welcome, it's great to have you here. Can't wait to read more posts...
it is only for your own good :-)

Welcome back, how was the journey?

There are somewhat solutions to access it, e.g. [this](/1CiAFnnf6kb2G1GzDV1FhttTWNxCa4mShn/?Post:38:ZeroNet+on+Android+%28easy+way%29), or remote (you could access via browser your ZN from home)
